def_cn: (拳击中为练习或试探对手反应快慢而)轻拳出击
def_en: If you spar with someone, you box using fairly gentle blows instead of hitting your opponent hard, either when you are training or when you want to test how quickly your opponent reacts.

def_cn: 争论，争辩，拌嘴(但不动真格的)
def_en: If you spar with someone, you argue with them but not in an aggressive or serious way.
A spar is a strong pole, especially one that a sail is attached to on a sailing ship.
